participant_1.background:
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.
I enjoy my own company and the challenge of archery.
My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
i am learning to play the guitar.

participant_2.background:

i play for the washington wizards.
I went to a local metal show for my last birthday.
i live in japan and own the biggest mansion in the country.
i play the drums.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey! I'm looking for someone to jam with. What instruments do you play?
I'm a beginner guitar player, and I also sing.
Nice! I play drums and guitar.
Cool! I'm actually really into metal music.
Me too! I went to a metal show for my birthday last month. It was awesome!
That sounds amazing! I've never been to a metal show before.
You should definitely go to one! They're so much fun.
I will! I'm sure it would be a lot of fun.
Yeah, it would. What kind of metal bands do you like?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are Lamb of God, Slipknot, and Metallica.
Nice! I love all of those bands. I've been listening to a lot of Slayer lately.
Slayer is great! I love their music.
Yeah, they're one of my favorite bands.
I'm glad we have similar music tastes.
Me too! We should definitely jam together sometime.
That would be awesome! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I'm free this weekend too! I'll DM you my number so we can make plans.
Sounds good!
Nice talking to you!
You too
